item.title: The AI Agent Platform Bankr is currently developing an API to support agent-based encrypted payments and an information layer.
item.description: On July 28th, the AI agent platform Bankr disclosed that it is in the process of developing the Bankr API. This API will enable agents or apps to utilize Bankr as a cryptographic payment or information layer. In the first phase, BNKR is used to pay for each query via x402 and obtain transaction data execution. In the second phase, wallet creation is supported, and it is completely controlled by the agent or app through Bankr.BlockBeats reported previously that on July 24th, Coinbase Ventures announced that it would provide support to Bankr through the Base Ecosystem Fund. Bankr is one of the agent platforms integrated into Coinbase's newly launched Base app. Transaction agents respond more quickly than humans, operate 24/7, and are capable of making more data-driven decisions.

item.title: BNB Surges to Touch $860, Continues to Hit All-Time High
item.description: On July 28th, BNB witnessed a short-term spike and reached $860, continuously hitting a brand-new all-time high. Currently, it is trading at $855.09, and within a 24-hour period, the price has increased by 7.15%.

item.title: The address bought 5073.16 ETH at a high slippage price, with an average price of $3958 per ETH.
item.description: On July 28th, according to the monitoring of on-chain analyst AI Yi @ai_9684xtpa, an address carried out a high slippage transaction on the blockchain. It spent 20.08 million USDC to purchase 5073.16 ETH, and the trade was completed in only two transactions. The average purchase price was $3958, which was $37 higher than the ETH price on centralized exchanges at the same time ($3921).

item.title: A whale increased their ETH holdings with an average price of $3,916, acquiring 2,415 ETH.
item.description: On July 28th, as per the monitoring of EmberCN, a whale address utilized 9.45 million USDC to make a purchase of 2415 ETH on-chain within the past 2 hours. The price at which this transaction took place was $3916 per ETH.

item.title: Analysis: Over the past decade, Bitcoin has only seen price increases in August for three years, potentially entering a consolidation phase due to seasonal disturbances.
item.description: July 28th: According to Matrixport's analysis, "A month ago, based on contrarian seasonal analysis, we proposed that Bitcoin was expected to rise to $116,000, and now this prediction has been verified by the market. The current market sentiment is gradually becoming optimistic. This week will witness a series of key events: the intensive disclosure of U.S. stock earnings reports, the delayed release of the White House's digital asset report, and the Federal Reserve interest rate decision, which may become a new round of catalysts driving market volatility."However, historical data indicates that August and September have historically been relatively weak months for Bitcoin performance. Over the past decade, the average return rate in August has been nearly zero, with only three years showing gains. Therefore, many traders often choose to lock in profits at this stage. Although we still maintain a bullish outlook for the year, considering seasonal fluctuations, the market may face a t

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Dips Below $119,000
item.description: On July 28th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin dropped below $119,000, and its 24-hour growth rate narrowed to 0.63%.

item.title: Gate launches various investment options, with BTC's annualized return currently at 13.14%.
item.description: On July 28th, the cryptocurrency exchange platform Gate recently launched the 290th round of the Launchpool event, enabling users to stake BTC and NERO in order to earn 40,000,000 NERO tokens as rewards. This round of the event will officially commence at 20:00 (UTC+8) on July 28th and will continue until 20:00 (UTC+8) on August 11th.According to the official page, the estimated annualized yield for BTC in this round of the event is as high as 13.14%, and VIP users are also eligible to enjoy a bonus of up to 500% on the staking amount. Users can stake early, and the rewards will be automatically distributed on an hourly basis after the mining begins.At the same time, Gate has launched various BTC financial products. The current on-chain BTC staking annualized yield is 3%, and the BTC Flexible Savings Yield is 5.64%.

item.title: A whale increased their holdings by acquiring 5,097.17 ETH at an average price of $3,924.
item.description: On July 28th, as monitored by OnchainLens, a whale address spent 20 million USDT to acquire 5,097.17 ETH at a price of around $3,924 per ETH.Address: 0x6e1784b360f1becb692fcf8393a699811af90733.

item.title: Binance will list BANANAS31/TRY, CVX/USDC, and other spot trading pairs, and will also make available related trading bot services.
item.description: On July 28th, Binance will list the trading pairs of BANANAS31/TRY, CVX/USDC, FUN/USDC, and LISTA/USDC on the spot market. These listings will take place on July 29th, 2025, at 16:00 (UTC+8), offering users more options for spot trading.In addition, Binance will launch trading bot services for the following pairs at 16:00 (UTC+8) on July 29th, 2025: Spot Algorithm Orders for BANANAS31/TRY, CVX/USDC, FUN/USDC, and LISTA/USDC spot grids; and Spot DCA (Dollar-Cost Averaging) for BCH/USDC and SPK/USDC.

item.title: HTX DeepThink: Trade Truce Boosts Crypto Market Confidence, Fed Decision Remains Short-Term Key Variable
item.description: On July 28th, the HTX researcher Chloe pointed out in a post that there have been indications of a relaxation in the global trade situation recently. The US and Europe reached an accord on their tariff dispute. High-level officials from China and the US are continuously advancing negotiations. And regional talks such as the Japan-US and US-Canada-Mexico talks are also picking up speed, providing support for the stability of the global supply chain and a resurgence in market risk appetite. This trend may boost medium- to long-term investor confidence and lay the foundation for a phase of recovery for risk assets such as BTC.In the short term, the market's attention has shifted to the July 25th (Thursday) Federal Reserve interest rate decision. Although the market generally anticipates that the interest rate will remain unchanged, Powell's remarks during the press conference will be crucial. Currently, the US core inflation is gradually easing, the pressure of fiscal deficits persists,
